emails.content: Hello, I hope I will be able to use this platform. Afterall I helped in it's development :)
hopefully it will work :)

description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Hello,
we will look at it.

Thank you for your report.

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Good day,
thank you for letting us know. We will look into it.

CSIRT

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Good day,
we are currently investigating a possible attack on your website. Please remain calm and do not respond to any suspicious emails.

Thank you,

CSIRT

description: Email address of it_department, used to send spam

emails.content:
Good day,

we need to inform you that you might be under attack. We have got reports about fishing mails sent from this address. We recommend you to check it,

Thank you

CSIRT

description: Email address of Peter Quinn, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Good day,
we have strong suspicion you might might have been a victim of phishing attack. If you recently visited website: "nice-project.ini.ex" we strongly recommend to change your passwords.

Have a safe day.

CSIRT-U

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Good day,
we need to warn you that we have strong suspicion that your website could have been used for phishing. Please check it and give as response as soon as possible.

Thank you.

CSIRT-U

Hello,

we provide cloud hosting for the university. Do you mean our cloud website was abused for phishing? Or some website hosted in our cloud?


Regards,

Cloud team

Hello,

there might have been misuse of your website for phishing attacks. We would need to see the logs of your website "nice-project.uni.ex".

Have a good day.

CSIRT-U

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

Thank you for being so cooperative.

CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Good day,
we have contacted you because there was a misuse of websites you are hosting for phishing attacks. We request you, as an admin of these services, to provide as logs from your servers.

Thank you,

CSIRT-U

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on my machines.

Regards,
Harris

Good day,
we inform you that sensitive personal infromation was leaked from website "nice-rpoject.uni.ex". Specifically names, birth dates and email addresses. Please handle this situation.

Thank you for your cooperation,

CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,

thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP.

Sincerely,
Kim Hoffman
Data Protection Officer
